tgt_original: 此贍部洲八萬四千城邑聚落、八萬四千諸人王等，各於其國受諸快樂，皆得自在，所有財寶豐足受用，不相侵奪，隨彼宿因而受其報，不起惡念貪求他國，咸生少欲利樂之心，無有鬪戰繫縛等苦。

tgt_original: 處座端嚴如日輪，　　演說金光微妙典。

src_original: sveṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣvabhiramerantena puṇyena caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmayaṃ  ca jambudvīpaḥ sphīto bhaviṣyati /  subhikṣaśca ramaṇīyaśca bahujanasamākīrṇaścarddhaścaujovataraśca bhaviṣyati /  ṛtumāsārdhamāsasaṃvatsarāṇi ca sarvāṇi samācārayuktāni bhaviṣyanti /  ahorātraṃ grahanakṣatracandrasūryāśca samāgrahiṣyanti /  kālena ca varṣadhārāḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatiṣyanti /  sarvajamdudvīpagatāni ca sattvāni sarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhāni bhaviṣyanti /
tgt_original: 以是因緣，此贍部洲安隱豐樂，人民熾盛，大地沃壤，寒暑調和，時不乖序，日月星宿常度無虧，風雨隨時，離諸災橫，資產財寶皆悉豐盈，心無慳鄙，常行慧施，具十善業，若人命終，多生天上，增益天眾。

src_original: svapnādvibuddhaśca babhūva rājā pītisphuṭaṃ sarvaśarīramasya /
tgt_original: 爾時彼王從夢覺，　　生大歡喜充遍身；

tgt_original: 至天曉已出王宮，　　往詣苾芻僧伽處。

tgt_original: 頗有法師名寶積，　　功德成就化眾生。

tgt_original: 爾時寶積大法師，　　在一室中而住止； 正念誦斯微妙典，　　端然不動身心樂。

src_original: (Bagchi 41)  yatkaścinmahārājo bhaved ya itthamasya suvarṇaprabhāsattamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotā  bhavenmānayitā ca pūjayitā ca teṣāṃ ca sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāmautsukyaṃ  satkuryād gurukuryānmānayetpūjayet /
tgt_original: 若未來世有諸人王聽受是經，恭敬供養并受持是經，四部之眾尊重稱讚。

src_original: deśenti rājasya tadantareṇa ratnoccayaṃ bhikṣu sa dharmabhāṇakam /

src_original: anyatra gūhāntarasaṃniṣaṇaṃ /  taṃ tena raśmīśriyayā jvalantam // Suv_14.9 //

tgt_original: 所謂微妙《金光明》，　　諸經中王最第一。

src_original: vanditva pādau ratanoccayasya susaṃbhavo rāja idaṃ pravīddhi /

tgt_original: 復欲安樂饒益汝等及諸眷屬無量百千諸藥叉眾，是故彼王常當聽受是妙經王，由得聞此正法之水甘露上味，增益汝等身心勢力，精進勇猛，福德威光悉令充滿。

src_original: deśe hi me pūrṇaśaśāṅka cakraṃ svarṇaprabhāsottamasūtraratnam // Suv_14.11 //
tgt_original: 唯願滿月面端嚴，　　為說金光微妙法。

src_original: adhivāsayī so ratanoccayaśca rājñaśca tasyaiva susaṃbhavasya /

src_original: sarvatrisāhasrikalokadhātau praharṣitāssarvi babhūvu devatāḥ // Suv_14.12 //

src_original: vasudhāpradeśe parame viśiṣṭe ratnodake gandhajalāmvusikte /  puṣpāvakīrṇāṃ dharaṇīṃ sa kṛtvā tatrāsanaṃ prāpya tadā narendraḥ // Suv_14.13 //

src_original: samalaṃkṛtaṃ rājña tadāsanaṃ ca cchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭasahasranekaiḥ /

src_original: abhiniṣkramitvā ratanoccayaṃ hi abhyo kiranti sma ca sālapuṣpā // Suv_14.16 //

src_original: so cāpi ratnoccaya dharmabhāṇakaḥ śubhābhagātraḥ śucivastraprāvṛtaḥ /

src_original: upasaṃkramitvā ca tadāsanaṃ hi kṛtāñjalībhūtva namasyate ca // Suv_14.17 //

tgt_original: 今可於斯贍部洲，　　普雨七寶瓔珞具；

src_original: caturṣu dvīpeṣu pravarṣitāni saptāni ratnāni tadantareṇa /

src_original: keyūrahārā varakuṇḍalāni tathānnapāne vasanāni caiva // Suv_14.24 //

src_original: yeneha me tyakta vasuṃdharā tadā catvāri dvīpāni saratnapūrṇā // Suv_14.26 //

src_original: suvarṇavarṇaṃ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇaṃ labheyi kāyaṃ priyadarśanaṃ sadā /
tgt_original: 金光百福相莊嚴，　　所有見者皆歡喜；

src_original: nayanābhirāmaṃ janakāntadarśanaṃ ratiṃkaraṃ devasahasrakoṭinām // Suv_14.29 //  navottaraṃ notisahasrakoṭyā kalpānabhūvaṃ nṛpacakravartī /

tgt_original: 「若有淨信善男子、善女人，欲於過去、未來、現在諸佛，以不可思議廣大微妙供養之具而為奉獻，及欲解了三世諸佛甚深行處，是人應當決定至心，隨是經王所在之處，城邑聚落或山澤中，廣為眾生敷演流布；

tgt_original: 其王爾時當淨澡浴，以香塗身，著新淨衣及諸瓔珞，坐小卑座，不生高舉，捨自在位，離諸憍慢，端心正念，聽是經王；

src_original: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃparidīpayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata //
tgt_original: 」於時世尊，即為彼天及諸大眾說伽他曰：

src_original: ya icchetsarvabuddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kartumacintiyām /

src_original: gambhīraṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ gocaraṃ ca prajanitum // Suv_15.1 //

tgt_original: 常以大光明，　　周遍皆照曜。

src_original: sahabodhitamātreṇa raśmijālapracodane /  nānāpadminīsaṃchannā kamalā bodhayiṣyanti // Suv_15.70 //
tgt_original: 於斯大地內，　　所有蓮花池； 日光照及時，　　無不盡開發。

src_original: sarvatra jambudvīpe 'sminnānāśasya phalauṣadhīḥ /
tgt_original: 於此贍部洲，　　田疇諸果藥；

src_original: paripācayanti samyak taṃ cātapayate mahim // Suv_15.71 //
tgt_original: 悉皆令善熟，　　充滿於大地。

src_original: tasmiṃśca khalu pugarmahārajāḥ kāle tasminsamaye tena manuṣyarājena sarvaśvetāni pāṇḍurāṇi navarucivastrāṇi prāvaritavyāni /  nānāvibhūṣaṇālaṃkārairātmā samalaṃkartavyaṃ /  mahatā rājānubhāvena mahatā rājavyūhena nānāvicitraratnamaṅgalaparigṛhītaistato rājakulādabhiniṣkramitavyam /  tasya ca dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ pratyudgamanāya gantavyam /
tgt_original: 「不應如是不迎法師。 時彼人王應著純淨鮮潔之衣，種種瓔珞以為嚴飾，自持白蓋及以香花，備整軍儀，盛陳音樂，步出城闕迎彼法師，運想虔恭為吉祥事。

src_original: atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrasyābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ sārdhamanupūrveṇa grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣvanucaṅkramati  atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate 'pareṇa tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro  'nyataramaṭavīkāntāraprāpto 'dhvani dadarśātrāntare māṃsabhakṣā vṛkaśṛgālakākapakṣiṇastāṃ  diśaṃ dhāvanti yatrāṭavīkāntāre 'ṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī /
tgt_original: 是時流水將其二子，漸次遊行城邑聚落，過空澤中深險之處，見諸禽獸豺狼狐玃鵰鷲之屬食血肉者，皆悉奔飛一向而去。

src_original: tadṛṭaṣṭvā tasyaitadabhūt /
tgt_original: 時長者子作如是念：

src_original: kasyārthamime māṃsabhakṣā vṛkaśṛgālakākapakṣiṇa imāṃ diśaṃ dhāvanti /
tgt_original: 『此諸禽獸何因緣故，一向飛走？
